privacy_policy.content:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 5, 2025

This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our website.

Information We Collect

  • Contact information (name, email, phone)
  • Usage data (pages visited, actions taken)
  • Device and browser information

How We Use Information

  • To provide, maintain, and improve our services
  • To communicate with you about updates and support
  • To ensure security and prevent fraud

Sharing

We do not sell personal information. We may share data with trusted service providers under contract to operate our services.

Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, or delete your data. Contact us at privacy@example.com.

Contact

If you have questions, contact privacy@example.com.

terms.content:
Terms & Conditions

Last updated: December 5, 2025

By accessing or using our website, you agree to these Terms.

Use of the Site

  • You must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent.
  • Do not misuse the site or attempt to interfere with its operation.

Intellectual Property

All content is owned by us or our licensors and protected by law.

Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use means acceptance of the changes.

Contact

Questions? Email legal@example.com.
